title: Hot Capone Is An Airbender, Gaffe City  5.26.20
itunes:title: Hot Capone Is An Airbender, Gaffe City  5.26.20
description:
In episode 637, Jack, Miles, and Jamie are joined by comedy writer and podcaster Cody Ziglar to discuss Joe Biden talking to Charlemagne the God, Riverdale, Capone, Avatar: The Last Airbender, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. @JoeBiden telling a black person this morning the following: "If you have a problem figuring out whether you're for me or Trump, then you ain't black."
  2. He Makes Archie Deep and Sabrina Dark. Meet Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa.
  3. Same New Archie Andrews
  4. For a Bizarre Moment, Riverdale Was Almost a Time-Travel Movie Starring Louis C.K. 
  5. Comic-Con: Archie's a hunk, Ms. Grundy's hot in 'Riverdale'
  6. Riverdale frames statutory rape as a sexy forbidden romance
  7. The Forgotten Legacy of Archie Comics’ Terrible and Delightful Made-for-TV Movie
  8. WATCH: Jughead does hip-hop "Sugar Sugar" (1990) Archies reunion
  9. For Josh Trank, Making a Movie About Syphilitic Al Capone Was Therapy
  10. Capone Features Tom Hardy at His Most Maximalist
  11. Ranking the accents of Tom Hardy: cockney, Welsh, or unintelligible?
  12. WATCH: Nicole Bus - You (Official Lyric Video)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
